title: bump all crates version due to 2024 release
body:
* `scuffle-aac`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-bytes-util`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-amf0`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-av1`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-batching`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-bootstrap`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-bootstrap-derive`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1
* `scuffle-context`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-future-ext`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `postcompile`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-signal`: 0.2.0 -> 0.2.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-settings`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-bootstrap-telemetry`: 0.1.0 -> 0.2.0 (⚠️ API breaking changes)
* `scuffle-http`: 0.1.0 -> 0.2.0 (⚠️ API breaking changes)
* `scuffle-pprof`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-metrics`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-metrics-derive`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1
* `scuffle-expgolomb`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-ffmpeg`: 0.1.3 -> 0.2.0 (⚠️ API breaking changes)
* `nutype-enum`: 0.1.1 -> 0.1.2 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-mp4`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-h264`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-h265`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-flv`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-h3-webtransport`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-rtmp`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)
* `scuffle-transmuxer`: 0.1.0 -> 0.1.1 (✓ API compatible changes)

### ⚠️ `scuffle-bootstrap-telemetry` breaking changes

```
--- failure enum_missing: pub enum removed or renamed ---

Description:
A publicly-visible enum cannot be imported by its prior path. A `pub use` may have been removed, or the enum itself may have been renamed or removed entirely.
        ref: https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/semver.html#item-remove
       impl: https://github.com/obi1kenobi/cargo-semver-checks/tree/v0.39.0/src/lints/enum_missing.ron

Failed in:
  enum scuffle_bootstrap_telemetry::opentelemetry::OpenTelemetryError, previously in file /tmp/.tmpsItBys/scuffle-bootstrap-telemetry/src/opentelemetry.rs:7
```

repo.description: Opensource Cloud Provider (focusing on video streaming)
